html:
4.28.18  4:00 pm   Is "We Could Just Get High" meant to be about drugs or elevation?

     it's choose your own adventure

4.28.18  3:56 pm   What type of content do you prefer making?

     i still haven't tried most of the types

4.28.18  3:35 pm   what are the factors of 1 in the universe that only has the number 1?

     1?

4.28.18  3:35 pm   Why should or shouldn't i major in economics

     you might want to get out there and do some real economics. but if you major in it in school that's good for the school because it helps their economics

4.28.18  3:00 pm   Why do you always use only lowercase letters with little exceptions?

     why do most people do it, including you

4.28.18  2:52 pm   How when we wait for videos two months

      i don't know but i'm the one making them

4.28.18  2:35 pm   Do radio stations pay the artists for permission to play their song(s), or do artists have to pay radio stations to play their music (like for publicity's sake or whatever)? 

     artists get paid per play on an estimated basis, but only if their songs show up during the sampled times. this is also assuming the artist has jumped through all the various invisible mysterious hoops that need to be jumped through, such as getting the song registered properly in all the right places

4.28.18  2:31 pm   Expert mode was how the website was laid out originally, yes? When did you first start to break stuff up into categories. And what were the first ones you made, songs and videos? (I feel like there may be a reality vid about this but I can't remember).

     i think it was during a break from the schedule in late july 2014. at that time i made what is now the first page of the site, but it included another category called "music videos" which are specifically videos set to a song, usually when the song is written first or maybe even recorded first, and the song is the entire contents of the video, rather than just a video which has musical elements. this seemed like an important distinction, and still is, but the lines kept getting blurred, and complicated further by the fact that almost all my videos are musical. eventually i disolved that category and included them all on the videos page

4.28.18  2:18 pm   If a dog is a dog, why does it dog?

     what were you expecting

4.28.18  1:52 pm   Why haven't you written anything in the notebook section of this website this year?

     i never wrote there. that is a place to upload things which i have written previously

4.28.18  1:47 pm   what should my major be?

     i don't know

4.28.18  1:37 pm   What do you do when you aren't working on new content?

     answering questions, and other things related to bill wurtz and the bill wurtz brand

4.28.18  1:22 pm   ever thought of  filming a video of the ground?

     i've done that at least a couple of times

      or underground?

     i have the footage and it will be used in an upcoming video

4.28.18  12:53 pm   did vidcon happen yet?

     not since last year

      if so how was it?

4.28.18  12:47 pm   Are chameleons comedians?

     they can be, especially if they are in a comedy environment

4.28.18  12:45 pm   Yo, Chris here, do you ever think you'll make a video just talking about your life?

     i think i've done a lot of those

      There's a lot we don't actually know about you.

     not as much as i don't know about you

      It's cool if not, just a thought.

4.28.18  12:42 pm   can we still revert global warming and pollution?

     i think so

4.28.18  12:37 pm   What do you think of communism 

     it could use a bit more flavour

4.28.18  12:15 pm   What are your thoughts on the sun?

     "oh gosh it's very hot here" ... "i must have melted already"

4.28.18  12:04 pm   thoughts on trump?

     he needs to eat more vegetables but it's probably not gonna happen

4.28.18  12:01 pm   Does knowing that your music and videos can cheer people up when they're feeling blue ever cheer you up when you're feeling blue?

     i don't usually feel blue but it does help me when i am feeling 'orange'

4.28.18  11:59 am   does the question thing actually work

     yes

4.28.18  11:51 am   what do you think about life?

     it is lifey

4.28.18  11:49 am   Seriously, what would happen if you took one Soap and another and merge them to combine their properties and characteristics?

     i am scared to find out

4.28.18  11:45 am   Can I build a wall inside a wall?

     oh that sounds wonderful

4.28.18  11:30 am   10 penguins or a goose of which has no legs and requires you or another assistance in order to walk?

     what about them

4.28.18  11:23 am   Should I ask a normal question or a nonsensical one

     looks like you got that sorted out

4.28.18  11:22 am   Why is do?

      for reasons of special interest

4.28.18  11:15 am   you have only said "cunt" once on this website?

     maybe more but probably only on the anagrams page

4.28.18  11:10 am   what form of media do you like best, movies, games, television shows, art, music, or some other form of media I have never heard of; and if so, what is your favorite sub-genre/category.☺                 

     it's only fun when you mix the types

4.28.18  11:07 am   did you start the french revolution 

     i tried

4.28.18  10:52 am   What is the best thing to fire from a catapult?

      itself, i know that's complicated but very rewarding if you can figure it out

4.28.18  10:02 am   what do you find beneficial about listening to current pop music?

     i listen to popular music from all time periods available, which is mostly 1890-2018. there are 2 reasons i can think of, 1 is it helps to learn more about the world i live in, and 2 just a lot of great music. another added bonus is it actually helps me avoid falling into trends because when you listen to all the time periods together you start to realise that everyone's just trying to make good songs, regardless of what particular snare drum happened to be on sale at the store that year

     you don't seem to be following popular trends stylistically

     i think that can backfire

     so i just wonder what you take away from current top 40.

4.28.18  8:42 am   Regarding a question of mine you answered, you're response was very deep. Do you like flat bread sandwiches

     how about flattening the entire sandwich

4.28.18  8:30 am   consider the following: stars

     i have considered it but i will consider it more

4.28.18  8:03 am   Why is 1+1+1+1=1?

     perhaps if 1 is the only number you have available

4.28.18  7:20 am   am i actually a lamp?

     no but you may have some of the same characteristics

     prokaryotes?

4.28.18  6:05 am   are ufos real

     sometimes

4.28.18  4:58 am   In your newest video "and the day goes on" would you describe the recurring character with the green hair as yourself?

     no, but i can relate, in some ways

4.28.18  4:15 am   what causes water to go from clouds to rain?

     more water

4.28.18  4:13 am   You said your lyrics have a deeper meaning.

     than what

      How can I understand it?

     my favorite approach to understanding a song is to listen to it. that's not a trick for understanding lyrics alone per se, but rather a trick for understanding the song, where in you can find the lyrics in their natural habitat

4.28.18  3:42 am   what paradox do you like the most

     the non-paradox

     sometimes

4.28.18  3:01 am   Did you know that there are people who are waiting patiently for your content and are sad to see you struggling with time?

     yes

     pop

     i did not go back to my seat

     nowadays i try to channel everything into use for audio/visual content to be posted on one of my main sites/channels

     yes

4.28.18  12:00 am   why do you decide to type oh as "0h" in videos such as and the day goes on as well as outside

     for some variety. oh is kind of a boring word (on paper), so it needs all the help it can get
